scorer

Source: vignettes/scorer.Rmd
scorer.Rmd
library(fvbb.scorer)
library(rvest) 
#> Loading required package: xml2

path_list <- list(
saisonmanager = "https://fvbb.saisonmanager.de",
spielplan =  "<saisonmanager>/index.php?seite=spielplan",
spielplan_u11 = "<spielplan>&table=789")

paths <- kwb.utils::resolve(path_list)

xml2::read_html(paths$spielplan_u11) %>% 
  rvest::html_nodes("td")
#> {xml_nodeset (648)}
#>  [1] <td class="right" style="border-width:1px 0px 0px 0px;">1</td>
#>  [2] <td class="left" style="border-width:1px 0px 0px 0px;">21.09.2019</td>
#>  [3] <td class="left" style="border-width:1px 0px 0px 0px;">11:00</td>
#>  [4] <td id="loc19263" class="left tooltip" style="border-width:1px 0px  ...
#>  [5] <td class="right" style="border-width:1px 0px 0px 0px;">Eisbären Ju ...
#>  [6] <td class="np" style="border-width:1px 0px 0px 0px;">-</td>\n
#>  [7] <td class="left" style="border-width:1px 0px 0px 0px;">SG Ost</td>
#>  [8] <td class="left" style="border-width:1px 0px 0px 0px;">Berlin Rocke ...
#>  [9] <td class="center" style="border-width:1px 0px 0px 0px;"><a href="/ ...
#> [10] <td class="right">2</td>
#> [11] <td class="left">21.09.2019</td>
#> [12] <td class="left">12:00</td>
#> [13] <td id="loc19264" class="left tooltip">Berlin, Brillat-Savarin-Schu ...
#> [14] <td class="right">Berlin Rockets</td>
#> [15] <td class="np">-</td>\n
#> [16] <td class="left">Eisbären Juniors I</td>
#> [17] <td class="left">SC Potsdam</td>
#> [18] <td class="center"><a href="/index.php?seite=game&amp;game=19264">4 ...
#> [19] <td class="right">3</td>
#> [20] <td class="left">21.09.2019</td>
#> ...

content <- xml2::read_html(paths$spielplan_u11)

game_results_links <- xml2::read_html(paths$spielplan_u11) %>% 
  rvest::html_nodes("td.center a")

is_over <- rvest::html_text(game_results_links) != ""

game_links <- game_results_links[is_over] %>%  rvest::html_attr("href") 

game_links_full <- sprintf("%s%s", paths$saisonmanager, game_links)


table_scorers <- data.table::rbindlist(lapply(game_links_full, function(x) fvbb.scorer::get_scorers(x)))
#> Joining, by = "Spielnummer"
#> Joining, by = "Spielnummer"
#> Joining, by = "Spielnummer"
#> Joining, by = "Spielnummer"
#> Joining, by = "Spielnummer"
#> Joining, by = "Spielnummer"

cols_to_gather <- names(table_scorers)[!names(table_scorers) %in% c("scorer", "scorer_goal", "scorer_assistant")]

table_scorer_long <- tidyr::pivot_longer(table_scorers, 
                                         names_to = "score_type", 
                                         values_to = "scorer_name", 
                                         cols = c( "scorer_goal", "scorer_assistant"))

table_scorer_long_tidy <- table_scorer_long %>%  
  dplyr::mutate(score_type = stringr::str_remove_all(score_type, pattern = "scorer_")) %>% 
  dplyr::filter(!is.na(scorer_name)) 

table_scorer_long_tidy %>% 
  dplyr::count(scorer_name) %>%  
  dplyr::arrange(dplyr::desc(n)) 
#> # A tibble: 26 x 2
#>    scorer_name            n
#>    <chr>              <int>
#>  1 Dominik Czichkochi    18
#>  2 Oskar Dietz           10
#>  3 Kennett Kraft          8
#>  4 Mika Rymarzewicz       7
#>  5 Milan  Brunk           7
#>  6 Linus Rabe             6
#>  7 Jonathan Sitali        5
#>  8 Finn Viehoff           4
#>  9 Romy Gottschalkson     4
#> 10 Anton Bandrock         3
#> # … with 16 more rows
  dplyr::mutate
#> function (.data, ...) 
#> {
#>     UseMethod("mutate")
#> }
#> <bytecode: 0x361d580>
#> <environment: namespace:dplyr>
 

table_scorer_long_tidy %>% 
  dplyr::count(team, scorer_name, score_type) %>% 
  tidyr::pivot_wider(names_from = "score_type", values_from = "n", values_fill = list(n = 0)) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(goal,
                assistant, 
                scores = goal + assistant) %>% 
  dplyr::arrange(dplyr::desc(scores)) %>%  DT::datatable()
